document.full_text: taylor swift took the top prize at the academy of country music awards for the first time on sunday after being overshadowed at the las vegas ceremony by multiple winners miranda lambert and lady antebellum.
document.title: taylor swift wins top prize at country awards
lines_and_colors: taylor swift took the top prize at the academy of country music awards for the first time on sunday after being overshadowed at the las vegas ceremony by multiple winners miranda lambert and lady antebellum.
